conversations.body_text: Hello, this is your VAM Pro logistics tracking update. Your pedals will ship from our US warehouse, but they are currently out of stock. We will ship them to you after restocking tomorrow. https://t.17track.net/en#nums=SF6045930181279

Thank you so much for the update.


Regards,

Omar Moreno Medrano
Quality Control Manager
NACE CIP LVL III #33959
AMPP Senior Certified Coating Inspector N-33959
Coating Industries Inc.
Office: 713-937-8581
Cell:    832-980-8648
omar@coatingindustries.com




On Mon, Sep 29, 2025 at 11:01 PM service@simsonn.com

Where is my package?

Regards,

Omar Moreno Medrano
Quality Control Manager
NACE CIP LVL III #33959
AMPP Senior Certified Coating Inspector N-33959
Coating Industries Inc.
Office: 713-937-8581
Cell:    832-980-8648
omar@coatingindustries.com




On Mon, Sep 29, 2025 at 11:01 PM service@simsonn.com
Hi Omar Moreno,    We apologize for the delay. We are currently on an 8-day holiday. Your order has been shipped from our U.S. warehouse. Thank you for your understanding and patience.
